dict.acceptation: 我们，咱们；笔者，本人；朕；人们；

sent.orig: We will not attack unless we are attacked; if we are attacked, we will certainly counterattack.
sent.trans: 人不犯我， 我不犯人；人若犯我，我必犯人。

sent.orig: Don't worry about how we're going to pay for a new machine; we'll cross that bridge when we come to it.
sent.trans: 别担心我们将怎么支付新机器的款项，船到桥头自然直。

sent.orig: Every time we talk about the hard pioneering days, we have so much to say that we can't get it all out.
sent.trans: 大家一提起那艰苦创业的日子，总有说不完的话。

sent.orig: If we don't speak of our achievements, they won't run away. If we don't find out our faults, we'll be in a bad way.
sent.trans: 成绩不夸跑不了，缺点不找不得了。

sent.orig: Much as we may pride ourselves on our good taste, we are no longer free to choose the things we want, for advertising exerts a subtle influence on us.
sent.trans: 尽管我们可能对自己的良好鉴赏力感到十分自豪，但我们不再能任意选择我们所需要的东西了，因为我们受到了广告的微妙影响。
